name: Grey Seer

abilities.name: Swarmed
abilities.description: If you roll a 6 for the attack when using Vermintide, the affected target suffers D3 wounds instead of 1.

abilities.name: Warpstone Token
abilities.description: After making an action roll to generate a Gray Seer's hero dice, you can choose to re-roll one of the dice. If you do so and roll 1, suffer a wound.

renown: If the total you roll 13 on your action roll, gain D6 renown.
